title: Bloomberg Markets: Saudi-Led Alliance Moves to Isolate Qatar
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Saudi-Led Alliance Moves to Isolate Qatar
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Zainab Fattah Middle East Politics and Government Reporter Bloomberg News Discussing Saudi Arabia and three other Arab countries cut off most diplomatic and economic ties to Qatar, in an unprecedented move designed to punish one of the region’s financial superpowers for its ties with Iran and Islamist groups in the region. Caroline Hyde of Bloomberg Television also participates in the conversation.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
